anti_patterns_to_avoid.vague_summaries: DO NOT: '3 files classified as noise' → DO: 'O:/path/file.txt (line 45) - noise (reason: rotting data, MPS: 12, Agent: gemma_cleanup, Command: rm file.txt)'
anti_patterns_to_avoid.generic_priorities: DO NOT: 'P2' → DO: 'MPS 9 (C:2, I:3, D:2, P:2) - Easy fix, moderate importance'
anti_patterns_to_avoid.manual_instructions: DO NOT: 'Fix manually' → DO: 'bash -c "sed -i 's/old/new/g' file.txt" + verify: grep -q new file.txt'
anti_patterns_to_avoid.no_verification: DO NOT: 'Applied fix' → DO: 'verify_command: test -f output.json && jq .valid output.json'
anti_patterns_to_avoid.no_learning: DO NOT: One-off fix → DO: 'Pattern: outdated_reference (freq: 3), Prevention: Add post-update hook'
